text: John M. Webster (July 20, 1877 – June 7, 1963) was an American politician who served as the eighteenth Mayor, of Somerville, Massachusetts. In December 1921 Webster was elected Mayor of Somerville, he was reelected over John J. Murphy in December 1923. ==Notes== Category:Massachusetts city council members Category:Massachusetts Republicans Category:Mayors of Somerville, Massachusetts Category:1877 births Category:1963 deaths
title: John M. Webster
